title: CSIS' Berg: Sanctions Heavily Impact Venezuela's Moves
description: Ryan Berg, director of the Americas Program and head of the Future of Venezuela Initiative at CSIS, says the move signals where the US sees itself in broader great-power competition with China. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
